creatures.name: Ash Zombie
creatures.desc: Very dangerous if meet if multiple

creatures.name: Bat
creatures.desc: Sleeps in caves at day, hunts at night

creatures.name: Bear
creatures.desc: Wanders alone in the forest. Beware of them when they have kids

creatures.name: Skeleton bear
creatures.desc: Rare variant of bear. Flee immediatly if you see one

creatures.name: Wolf
creatures.desc: Hunts in packs. Can be domesitated
